en.title: Congratulations to Winners of FE's Halong Bay Vietnam Incentive Holiday (05th - 08th June 2009)!
en.content:
Winners who attended FE's 1 Million Quantum Pendant Celebration Banquet on 23rd May 2009 were presented with Certificates of Achievement by FE's Founder CEO, Paul Ting and posed for a group photo. Enjoy your holiday, you have earned it! See you at the Top! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!! 
 
EXCITING NEWS!  
HOLIDAY TRIP FOR ACHIEVERS!
FE is pleased to announce a 4 Days 3 Nights Holiday Trip incentive for achievers to Hanoi and Halong Bay, Vietnam during June 2009 school holidays (Final Dates to be announced as soon as possible). 

Halong Bay is one of the world’s natural wonders, and is the most beautiful tourist destination of Vietnam. Halong Bay features more than one thousand awesome limestone karsts and islands of various sizes and shapes along the 120km coastline of Bai Chay Beach. 
 
To Qualify : Achieve a total of 15 cycles and above within 3 months starting 01st February 2009 to 30th April 2009.
Conditions : Holiday Trip incentive is non-transferable.
: Management reserves the right to change to another similar holiday package depending on availability.
: Management reserves the right to deny the Holiday Trip incentive but will compensate appropriately.
  
GO FOR IT AND SEE YOU THERE ! AHOO !! AHOO!! AHOO!!
